column2:
"Yes, I got the report. Your application for the
unrestricted exploration permit won't be delayed.
I expect great things from you."

"...and well, the regulated report
ended like that.
So, now listen to what I have to say."

"Free movement sounds good, but that
area is not guaranteed to be safe,
so it's also dangerous to go there."

"So, please don't slack on
your preparation and don't be careless."

"This permission won't be earned with a
half-hearted attempt. Please try to take care
of yourself keeping that in mind."
